src:
Spajić spasio Krasnodar, sjajan gol Srbina [VIDEO]
03 Nov 2019, 18:22 by Milos
Krasnodar i Rostov odigrali su derbi 19. kola Premijer lige Rusije.
Susret je završen rezultatom 2:2 (0:2), na neverovatan način. Naime, Rostov je vodio sa 2:0 golovima Jonova u 32. i 41. minutu.Krasnodar je do boda stigao u sudijskoj nadoknadi pogocima Ignjatjeva u 93. i reprezentativca Srbije Uroša Spajića.



Na tabeli vodi Zenit sa 33 boda, druga je Lokomotiva sa 30, koliko ima i trećeplasirani Rostov, dok je Krasnodar četvrti sa 29 bodova.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Spajic rescues Krasnodar, great Serb goalie [VIDEO]
03 Nov 2019, 17:22 by Milos
Krasnodar and Rostov played the 19th round of the Premier League of Russia.
The match ended with a score of 2: 2 (0: 2), in an incredible way. Specifically, Rostov led with 2-0 goals by Jonov in the 32nd and 41st minutes.



Zenit leads the table with 33 points, the second is Lokomotiva with 30, as well as third-placed Rostov, while Krasnodar is fourth with 29 points.
